message: Dear {{ doc.lead_name }}, as discussed with {% set var = frappe.db.get_value("User", doc.lead_owner, "full_name") %} {{var}}, your meeting has been confirmed on {{ doc.meeting_scheduled_on }} . Looking forward to meeting you and servicing your requirement. For more details please contact: {% set var = frappe.db.get_value("User", doc.lead_owner, "full_name") %} {{var}} - Team Switch My Loan
name: Meeting Scheduled SMS
subject: Meeting Scheduled
